abstract: Administration of Louisiana Gov Bobby Jindal moves to sell state's remaining share of large tobacco settlement in bid to ease state's budget troubles; critics call plan waste of valuable asset in exchange for quick fix.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Bobby Jindal’s administration moved ahead Tuesday with a plan to sell the state’s remaining share of a huge tobacco settlement.

headline.main: Louisiana: Jindal Seeks to Sell Rights to Tobacco Deal
headline.print_headline: Louisiana: Jindal Seeks to Sell Rights to Tobacco Deal

snippet: Gov. Bobby Jindal’s administration moved ahead Tuesday with a plan to sell the state’s remaining share of a huge tobacco settlement.
